title: Charles Ducasse
text: Charles Ducasse, known in Spain as Carlos Ducasse (1 May 1932 in <a href="Saint-Jean%20de%20Luz">Saint-Jean de Luz</a> – 26 October 1983 in <a href="Bayonne">Bayonne</a>) was a French <a href="association%20football">footballer</a>. He mostly played for Spanish clubs — one year with <a href="Real%20Sociedad">Real Sociedad</a> and four years with <a href="Real%20Valladolid">Real Valladolid</a>.
